Title: The Shawshank Redemption
Cast: Tim Robbins, Morgan Freeman, Bob Gunton, William Sadler
Description: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

Title: Fight Club
Cast: Brad Pitt, Edward Norton, Helena Bonham Carter, Meat Loaf
Description: An insomniac office worker looking for a way to change his life crosses paths with a devil-may-care soap maker and they form an underground fight club that evolves into something much, much more...

Title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
Cast: Elijah Wood, Ian McKellen, Orlando Bloom, Sean Bean
Description: A meek hobbit of The Shire and eight companions set out on a journey to Mount Doom to destroy the One Ring and the dark lord Sauron.

Title: One Flew Over the Cuckoo's Nest
Cast: Jack Nicholson, Louise Fletcher, Michael Berryman, Peter Brocco
Description: Upon admittance to a mental institution, a brash rebel rallies the patients to take on the oppressive head nurse.

Title: Inception
Cast: Leonardo DiCaprio, Joseph Gordon-Levitt, Ellen Page, Ken Watanabe
Description: A skilled extractor is offered a chance to regain his old life as payment for a task considered to be impossible.

Title: Goodfellas
Cast: Robert De Niro, Ray Liotta, Joe Pesci, Lorraine Bracco
Description: Henry Hill and his friends work their way up through the mob hierarchy.

Title: Star Wars
Cast: Mark Hamill, Harrison Ford, Carrie Fisher, Alec Guinness
Description: Luke Skywalker joins forces with a Jedi Knight, a cocky pilot, a wookiee and two droids to save the universe from the Empire's world-destroying battle-station, while also attempting to rescue Princess Leia from the evil Darth Vader.

Title: Seven Samurai
Cast: Toshirô Mifune, Takashi Shimura, Keiko Tsushima, Yukiko Shimazaki
Description: A poor village under attack by bandits recruits seven unemployed samurai to help them defend themselves.

Title: Forrest Gump
Cast: Tom Hanks, Robin Wright, Gary Sinise, Sally Field
Description: Forrest Gump, while not intelligent, has accidentally been present at many historic moments, but his true love, Jenny Curran, eludes him.

Title: The Matrix
Cast: Keanu Reeves, Laurence Fishburne, Carrie-Anne Moss, Hugo Weaving
Description: A computer hacker learns from mysterious rebels about the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.

Title: The Godfather
Cast: Marlon Brando, Al Pacino, James Caan, Diane Keaton
Description: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.

Title: The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers
Cast: Elijah Wood, Ian McKellen, Viggo Mortensen, Orlando Bloom
Description: While Frodo and Sam edge closer to Mordor with the help of the shifty Gollum, the divided fellowship makes a stand against Sauron's new ally, Saruman, and his hordes of Isengard.

Title: City of God
Cast: Alexandre Rodrigues, Matheus Nachtergaele, Leandro Firmino, Phellipe Haagensen
Description: Two boys growing up in a violent neighborhood of Rio de Janeiro take different paths: one becomes a photographer, the other a drug dealer.

Title: City of God
Cast: Alexandre Rodrigues, Matheus Nachtergaele, Leandro Firmino, Phellipe Haagensen
Description: Two boys growing up in a violent neighborhood of Rio de Janeiro take different paths: one becomes a photographer, the other a drug dealer.

Title: Se7en
Cast: Morgan Freeman, Brad Pitt, Kevin Spacey, Andrew Kevin Walker
Description: Two detectives, a rookie and a veteran, hunt a serial killer who uses the seven deadly sins as his modus operandi.

Title: The Silence of the Lambs
Cast: Jodie Foster, Anthony Hopkins, Lawrence A. Bonney, Kasi Lemmons
Description: A young F.B.I. cadet must confide in an incarcerated and manipulative killer to receive his help on catching another serial killer who skins his victims.

Title: Once Upon a Time in the West
Cast: Henry Fonda, Charles Bronson, Claudia Cardinale, Jason Robards
Description: Epic story of a mysterious stranger with a harmonica who joins forces with a notorious desperado to protect a beautiful widow from a ruthless assassin working for the railroad.

Title: Casablanca
Cast: Humphrey Bogart, Ingrid Bergman, Paul Henreid, Claude Rains
Description: Set in unoccupied Africa during the early days of World War II: An American expatriate meets a former lover, with unforeseen complications.

Title: Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade
Cast: Harrison Ford, Sean Connery, Alison Doody, Denholm Elliott
Description: When Dr. Henry Jones Sr. suddenly goes missing while pursuing the Holy Grail, eminent archaeologist Indiana Jones must follow in his father's footsteps and stop the Nazis.

Title: The Pianist
Cast: Adrien Brody, Thomas Kretschmann, Frank Finlay, Emilia Fox
Description: A Polish Jewish musician struggles to survive the destruction of the Warsaw ghetto of World War II.

Title: The Intouchables
Cast: François Cluzet, Omar Sy, Anne Le Ny, Audrey Fleurot
Description: After he becomes a quadriplegic from a paragliding accident, an aristocrat hires a young man from the projects to be his caretaker.
